name: Avoid large Programs - too many Sections
description:
Avoid Programs with more than X Sections.
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
Associated to each COBOL Program with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The number of Sections
rationale: For maintainability aspect, COBOL programs with more than 10 Sections
remediation: If two sections do the same actions then try to merge them. This can improve the readability, the reusability and maintainability of the code. If it is not possible then try to split the program by extracting its functionalities into subprograms.
